text:
The Literary Society
gratefully acknowledges the contributions of time and talent of the students,
teachers and administrators of the University of Massachusetts in producing
these programs. It owes a special debt to members of the Departments of
English, Speech, Philosophy, German, Romance Languages and the Audio-
Visual Center. The College English Association cooperated throughout.
Directors'. Sidney Kaplan, H. Leland Varley
Chairmen of the Society: Frederick C. Ellert, Leon O. Barron
President: Madeleine May
Secretary: Lorna Regolsky
